name: Lovely Ghost Hunting Spree
description:
A small project I made around February 2020, right before lockdown. I wanted to make a shooter starring a ghost character, I had a larger scope at first but lowered into a simple endless game instead.

You play as Ghodette, a glutton ghost with a "pet" hair monster (named Berry), who loves the sweet taste of  smaller, weaker ghosts. Since they are so weak, Ghodette likes  self-imposing challenges to make hunting more fun, such as how many ghosts can fly past her.

(If arrow keys are scrolling the page, try zooming out, sorry for the inconvenience)
